comment.author: 40779816@N06
comment._content: Actually this scene is at or near Forestburg, PA on the Scranton Division showing a "Bullmoose" 2-10-2 pusher and another locomotive behind it with a loaded coal train heading South toward Cadosia.

comment.author: 49856465@N00
comment._content: If it was heading to Cadosia on the Scranton Division, it would have been heading North.
